meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to one sixtieth of a minute.
meanings.sent1: There are sixty ons in a minute.
meanings.sent2: He arrived in just a few ons.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred for several ons.
meanings.sent4: Time slipped away like sand through the ons.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's lecture felt like an eternity, dragging on for countless ons.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form the plural of some nouns.
meanings.sent1: I saw many books with -ons at the end.
meanings.sent2: The boxes were filled with various items and -ons.
meanings.sent3: The children collected all the toy -ons.
meanings.sent4: The garden was full of colorful flower -ons.
meanings.sent5: The room echoed with the sound of bouncing balloon -ons.
